title: Carlos Filipe
text:
Carlos Filipe Carvalho Ferreira Silva, known as Carlos Filipe (born 15 September 1975) is a former <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Primeira%20Liga">Primeira Liga</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Porto">Porto</a> on 2 June 1994 in a game against <a href="S.C.%20Beira-Mar">Beira-Mar</a>.
